response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $1,000,000 to me, reflecting its unique features, craftsmanship, and the exclusivity it offers. Considering its immense value and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. I am confident that this offer represents a fair deal, allowing you to enjoy the product's full potential while also providing you with a substantial savings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-quality product.", "product_price": 950000}
